modName: Demon Hunter Armour for Dream Girl
summary: Convertion Demon Hunter Armour by Jojjo for Dream girl female replacer.
descriptionHtml:
Install this only if you have [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41443/?]Dream Girl[/url] body!
This armour support weight slider!

How to install:
1. Download the armour from the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42169/?]original mod's page.[/url]
2. Install it
3. Download DG file here
4. Extract folder from archive, and throw folder to your Skyrim Data folder. Click "Yes", when ask to overwrite.
Enjoy!

Credits:
Jojjo, for his beautiful [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42169/?]Demon Hunter Armour[/url],
GraceDarkling and zzjay, for converting it to Skyrim,
Caliente for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url],
Akiro for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24828/?]Unbleak ENB[/url], Kris†a™ for Rebalance light ENB,
And, of course, Petrovich, for wonderful [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41443/?]Dream Girl[/url].

P.S. Sorry for bad English.
P.P.S. There so much tautology, sorry for it.
author: Jojjo and GraceDarkling and zzjay
